title: Frigidaire Professional Stainless Steel All Refrigerator - FPRU19F8RF
description:
Frigidaire Professional Stainless Steel All Refrigerator - FPRU19F8RF

Features:

PureAir® Filtration System 
Fresh air offers great taste. PureAir® Filtration removes up to 7 times more odor than baking soda to keep ingredients tasting fresh by removing odor particles with fast-acting, highly absorbent carbon technology

SpacePro™ Shelving System 
Offers quick access to fresh ingredients with organizational solutions designed for space optimization including SpacePro™ Door Bins, SpacePro™ Crisper Bins and SpacePro™ Full-Width Drawer

Smudge-Proof™ Stainless Steel 
Resists fingerprints and cleans easily

Built with American Pride 
Appliances that are high-performing, more accessible, and more innovative than ever — designed, built, and engineered in the U.S.A.

Automatic Alerts 
Alerts you if the door is left open, if the temperature rises or if the power goes out so your food stays at its optimal temperature

SpacePro™ Crisper Bins
Keep a variety of foods fresh and easily accessible with our SpacePro™ Crisper Bins

SpacePro™ Full-Width Drawer 
Fits a variety of fresh foods for quick access

SpacePro™ Shelving 
Optimize your refrigerator space with adjustable shelving

SpacePro™ Door Bins 
Access fresh food from our adjustable gallon-size door bins quickly

PowerBright™ LED Lighting 
Find fresh foods quickly with PowerBright™ LED Lighting

PrecisionPro Controls™ 
Adjust settings at the touch of a button



Specifications:

Capacity

Total Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 18.6

Shelf Area (Sq. Ft.): 20.6



General

Door Design: Flat

Door Finish: Smudge-Proof™ Stainless Steel

Door Handle Design: Stainless Steel

Cabinet Finish: Grey

Door Hinge Covers: Hidden

Automatic Door Closer: Yes

Leveling System / Leveling Legs: Yes / 4



Control

Controls: PrecisionPro™

Location of Controls: Inside Cabinet, on Top

Temperature Display C° / F°: Yes

Lock: Yes

Temp Failure Alerts (Audible & Duration): Yes

Door Ajar Alert (Audible): Yes

Power Failure Alert (Duration): Yes

Air Filter / Air Filter Change Indicator Light: PureAir® / Yes



Refrigerator

Refrigerator Shelves: 2 SpacePro™ Adjustable Glass

Full-Width Deli Drawer: 1 SpacePro™

Full-Width Bottom Crisper: 1 SpacePro™

Crisper Divider Quantity: 2 (Per Crisper)

Full-Width Gallon Door Bin: 2 Clear SpacePro™

Half-Width Liter Bin: 4 Clear SpacePro™

Dairy Bin: 1 Clear

Lighting: 8-Point PowerBright™ LED



Certifications

Sabbath Mode (Star-K® Certified): Yes



Power

Annual Energy (kWH): 331

Annual Energy Cost (.12 / kWH): $40

Power Supply Connection Location: Right Bottom Rear

Voltage Rating: 115V / 60Hz / 20A

Connected Load (kW rating) @ 115 Volts: 0.55

Amps @ 115 Volts: 5

Minimum Circuit Required (Amps): 20



Approximate Dimensions:

A - Height (Incl. Hinge): 70-5/8"

Width: 32"

Depth (Incl. Door): 26-1/2"

Depth with Door Open 90˚: 57-1/4"

Built-In Cutout Single Unit without Trim Kit Height: 72"

Width: 33"

Depth: 25-1/4"





Single Unit with Trim Kit & Leveling System Height: 75" - 79"

Width: 33"

Depth: 25-1/4"











Approximate Weight:

Shipping: 245 lbs



Warranty Information:

Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): One Year Parts and Labor
